fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Abundance: Whenever you empty your Hand the first time, immediately draw to your Hand Size.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Potion: Play a Heal! (Reforged) or Cleanse! (Reforged) on someone. [4 uses, 1 CD, Graveyard]
- Enmagick: Apply (Reforged) or (Satcheled) to a card. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Brew: Discard 2 cards. Gain a random Special card OR a non-Special of your choice. [Infinite uses, 3 CD] 
- Reform: Pick a card in your Hand, and change it to a non-Special card of your choice.  [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
